channel.title: 🏢 Georgetown University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Georgetown University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: On Differentially Private Subspace Estimation in a Distribution-Free Setting
item.description: This paper presents novel measures quantifying data easiness for DP subspace estimation, supporting them with improved upper and lower bounds and a practical algorithm.
